main event: A white or light colored object was sighted in the NW sky, moving slowly on December 30, 1952.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3 minutes,The object appeared to be six or more feet in diameter,It had a dazzling light in the center,The object was concluded to be a balloon based on its behavior and appearance,The object's course was ESE.
sighted object: one white or light colored object
